thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 28 of 40
thread.title: TRAUD, DAVID

author: TRAUD, DAVID
title: TRAUD, DAVID
text: Phenomenal service and support after the sale. I have never encountered this level of support from an online retailer. When I recently had a problem with my decade-old ExpoBar machine, WLL's support technicians helped me diagnose the problem, make adjustments and order the correct replacement part; in one phone call! All of this was accomplished without the need to package and ship the (very heavy) machine back to their shop. They have a customer for life with me!
